docs.snippet: For the first time since flexible scheduling came to "Sunday Night Football" in 2006, the NFL could go an entire season without needing it....
docs.lead_paragraph: For the first time since flexible scheduling came to "Sunday Night Football" in 2006, the NFL could go an entire season without needing it.

headline.main: NFL Might Not Flex Any Sunday Night Games in 2014
headline.print_headline: NFL Might Not Flex Any Sunday Night Games in 2014
